name: It's Manual, Not Unskilled!
author: Tariq K
description: Changes all verbs using ‘Unskilled’ to ‘Manual’. That's it. No, really. That's it.
description_long: It's just… look. All labor requires skill. There's no such thing as ‘unskilled’ labor. Hell, you develop the skill in this damn game to get better at the ‘unskilled’ labor, come on! I mean— ok, you know what? I'll stop. Sorry. It was bothering me so, so much.
